name: Prince-Of-Tokyo
description:
MV "Prince Of Tokyo" -------------------- CallSign: 3FSZ7 Ex-Name(s) : SANOYAS MIZUSHIMA 1146 Type : Handymax Sub type : Wood Chip Carrier Gears : 3x14T Cranes
1.The cargo space is divided into six cargo holds with hopper bottom. The frame arrangement in the cargo space is designed for facilitation of woodchip loading and unloading.

2.Cargo handling equipment is 975-t/h woodchip unloading system consisting of three high-speed cranes, four hoppers and conveyers on deck.

3.End-folding hatch covers driven by hydraulic cylinders for opening and closing.
